description: Pangea is an innovative initiative focused on sustainable agriculture through composting. Established six years ago, Pangea transforms agro-industrial waste into high-quality organic fertilizers, promoting regenerative farming practices. By utilizing advanced composting techniques, the company reduces production time and environmental impact, while supporting local cultivators with tailored products. Pangea aims to enhance soil health and contribute to a circular economy, fostering a more sustainable agricultural landscape.
name: Pangea
